snippet.title: Poll: Obama leads in Wisconsin
snippet.description:
* (CNN) – A new poll of likely voters in Wisconsin shows President Barack Obama with an eight point lead over Republican nominee Mitt Romney in the state. The Marquette University Law School poll indicates 51% of likely Wisconsin voters backing the...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2012/10/31/poll-obama-leads-in-wisconsin/

snippet.title: Poll: Obama maintains lead in Wisconsin
snippet.description:

http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2012/07/11/poll-obama-maintains-lead-in-wisconsin/

snippet.title: Tennessee's Summitt: 'It has been a privilege'
